name: Mini Michelin by Wokstar Games
description:
Mini Michelin is a game in development for the Unity Global Student Challenge https://blogs.unity3d.com/2018/10/29/welcome-to-the-unity-global-student-challen... . 

This 2.5D platformer mixes learning with an interactive experience, taking cooking to the player in new and fun ways to help the player who learn to cook a broad variety of recipes from all around the world!

 Game in Development by a Student Group:

Ronan Kelly - Game Design Lead

Ais Shiro - Production and Management Lead

Rhys Hennessy - Programming Lead

Stephen Wann - Art and UI Lead
